content.body: so i guess we can all get high resolution timers now

> Remarkably, we show that distinguishing cache misses from cache hits can be done without time measurements, replacing timing based primitives with timerless and architecture-agnostic counterparts based on race conditions
content.formatted_body: Remarkably, we show that distinguishing cache misses from cache hits can be done without time measurements, replacing timing based primitives with timerless and architecture-agnostic counterparts based on race conditions
